highschool.description: Completed highschool as a honour roll student with an average of ~95%
highschool.name: Mississauga Secondary School

university.description: Finished first year Computer Engineering (co-op) and going into second year
university.name: University of Waterloo

points: Created a React & Node.js dashboard with Recharts for graphs and a process to track user clicks
Utilized the Ethereum network and C# to create in-app messenger and web games
Rebuilt an event management application used by over 50,000 users with React/Redux
Designed unit tests using Mocha/Chai and helped build a site that displays those errors externally
Moved 15+ Domino agents to a Node.js server calling SQL Procedures to reduce load on old servers
Improved image performance by 56% through client side image compression using Rust & Wasm
Built backend for user stories and fixed defects using Java, Spring Boot, and PostgreSQL
Leveraged Java and Jbehave/Rest Assured to create automated tests for a new public api
Designed new frontend components & features using React Hooks, Redux, Next.js and Sass

narrative: Having excellent communication skills is something I strive for, especially when in comes to dealing with non-technical teams. I've been developing my skills as a leader, presenter, and a teammate through varies experiences and along the way, I realized that staying organized and positive are my secrets to success.

projects.description: SM-Toolkit was built to help students with basic math operations such as matrix manipulations, conversions, and more. The idea was to practice math and programming fundamentals while trying to build a symbolab/wolfram alpha type website
projects.title: SM-Toolkit

projects.description: HTML5 game built using the Phaser Framework for Canvas and WebGL powered browser games. Authenticate to play an infinite game that gets harder as your score goes up. Collect coins while avoiding the bouncing spikes!
projects.title: ImpactFrenzy
Space Invaders (High Performance)

projects.title: Market Crash

projects.title: Werewolf
projects.description: Online multiplayer game of werewolf (also known as Mafia). Build chat rooms with websockets, where each user is given a role and their camera turns on at the appropriate time

projects.title: Flight Club
projects.description: Automated script that searches for specific live flight prices and matches them to predefined data in google sheets. Cheap flight details meeting the user's criteria are emailed to them
